PATIENT_ID: TEST_DROWNING_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-07 20:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-07 20:10:00
Category I activation for 24-year-old male. Drowning event.
Pulled from river after submersion. Found face down.
Submersion time unknown. Unclear if traumatic mechanism involved.
GCS 6 on arrival. Intubated in field.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-07 20:30:00
Submersion injury confirmed. Unclear circumstances of drowning.
No trauma evaluation documented.
No imaging obtained.
No documentation of any associated traumatic injuries.
Patient admitted to ICU for respiratory management.
